com.n9mtq4.logwindow.ui

Class SimpleConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.n9mtq4.logwindow.ui.SimpleConsoleUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    History.HistorySupport, ConsoleUI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiJFrame, GuiJFrameLightWeight, UIScanner, UISocket, UISocketOut

    public abstract class SimpleConsoleUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConsoleUI, History.HistorySupport
    Created by will on 8/13/15 at 2:24 AM.
    A default implementation of ConsoleGui.
    Since:
    v5.0
    Author:
    Will "n9Mtq4" Bresnahan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • print

        @Deprecated
public final void print(java.lang.Object object,
                                    Colour colour)
        Deprecated. 
        Note: Don't override me! Override ConsoleUI.print(java.lang.Object, com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour) instead
        Note: Don't use me!
        A small helper method that BaseConsole calls. This method adds support for default text color.
        Specified by:
        print in interface ConsoleUI
        Parameters:
        object - the object to print
        colour - the colour
        See Also:
        ConsoleUI.print(java.lang.Object, com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour)

      • printObject

        public abstract void printObject(java.lang.Object object,
                                 Colour colour)
        Note: Override me!
        Called when a BaseConsole wants to print something.
        Parameters:
        object - The object that the user wants to print that should be handled
        colour - The colour that the user wants to print the object in. If colour is null, it will be automatically set to the defaultTextColour, however, if you haven't given defaultTextColour a colour be prepared for colour to be null
        See Also:
        setDefaultTextColour(com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour), getDefaultTextColour()

      • historyUpdate

        public void historyUpdate(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> history)
        Default history support implementation
        Specified by:
        historyUpdate in interface History.HistorySupport
        Parameters:
        history - The ArrayList of strings that contains all the history

      • getParent

        public final BaseConsole getParent()
        Gets the parent BaseConsole.
        Returns:
        The base console that the gui is linked to.

      • getDefaultTextColour

        public Colour getDefaultTextColour()
        Gets the default text colour to use when one is not specified
        If you called setDefaultTextColour - no need to do anything. It's handled on a lower level.
        Returns:
        The colour that is the default colour to be used when one isn't specified
        See Also:
        setDefaultTextColour(com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour)

      • setDefaultTextColour

        public final void setDefaultTextColour(Colour defaultTextColour)
        Sets the default text colour to use when one is not specified
        The super class will set the colour in print to whatever is set here - no need to do anything. It's handled on a lower level.
        Parameters:
        defaultTextColour - The colour that is the default colour to be used when one isn't specified
        See Also:
        getDefaultTextColour()
